issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Deletion of expired workflow executions can fail due to a timer reference. 

Output that starts to constantly be logged
{code}
Caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: update or delete on table "swf_workflow_execution" violates foreign key constraint "fk_t09qm736p1nlnjtg4acfc5672" on table "swf_timer"
  Detail: Key (id)=(8af08a814afa8435014afca8211b0500) is still referenced from table "swf_timer".
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.receiveErrorResponse(QueryExecutorImpl.java:2161)
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.processResults(QueryExecutorImpl.java:1890)
        at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.execute(QueryExecutorImpl.java:255)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.execute(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:560)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.executeWithFlags(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:417)
        at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.executeUpdate(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:363)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor365.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.util.reflect.Methods.invoke(Methods.java:49)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.invocation.SimpleInvoker.invoke(SimpleInvoker.java:53)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.invocation.AllResultsCollector$Invocation.call(AllResultsCollector.java:143)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.util.concurrent.SynchronousExecutor$EagerFuture.<init>(SynchronousExecutor.java:406)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.util.concurrent.SynchronousExecutor.invokeAll(SynchronousExecutor.java:175)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.util.concurrent.SynchronousExecutor.invokeAll(SynchronousExecutor.java:152)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.invocation.AllResultsCollector.collectResults(AllResultsCollector.java:81)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.invocation.InvokeOnManyInvocationStrategy.invoke(InvokeOnManyInvocationStrategy.java:62)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.invocation.InvocationStrategies.invoke(InvocationStrategies.java:35)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.invocation.LockingInvocationStrategy.invoke(LockingInvocationStrategy.java:59)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.sql.LocalTransactionContext$2.invoke(LocalTransactionContext.java:96)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.sql.AbstractInvocationHandler.invokeOnProxy(AbstractInvocationHandler.java:95)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.sql.AbstractInvocationHandler.invoke(AbstractInvocationHandler.java:85)
        at net.sf.hajdbc.sql.ChildInvocationHandler.invoke(ChildInvocationHandler.java:44)
        at com.sun.proxy.$Proxy159.executeUpdate(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor364.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
        at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.invoke(ProxyStatement.java:100)
        at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.intercept(ProxyStatement.java:57)
        at $java.lang.AutoCloseable$$EnhancerByProxool$$a485e07d.executeUpdate(<generated>)
        at org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.ResultSetReturnImpl.executeUpdate(ResultSetReturnImpl.java:133)
        ... 28 more
{code}

I've talked with [~sjones] and this is similar and similar fix to EUCA-10000. I'd like to see this get into 4.1
fields.summary: Clean up of expired workflow executions fails due to a timer reference

comments.body:
Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.1.0
Release     : 0.0.23040.365.20150121gitd6c7675.el6

Following the steps to reproduce I did not observe the error.
